items.title: Quick guide to Lark Mail
items.description: Lark Mail is a mailbox tool that'll enhance communication and boost productivity for your organization. Learn about it in this quick guide.

items.title: Configure Outlook account for Lark email migration
items.description: Configure the Outlook admin console to authorize email migration.

items.title: Bind Gmail service to Lark Mail
items.description: Organizations can bind Gmail service to Lark Mail so that members can directly send and receive emails from their Gmail account in Lark.

items.title: Lark Mail setup guide
items.description: For administrators who want to activate an IMAP/STMP email account that is being migrated to Lark Mail.

items.title: Use a public mailbox to send and receive emails
items.description: Administrators can centralize email management by creating public mailboxes that are accessible by multiple users.

items.title: Use Lark Mail on third-party email clients
items.description: Log in to Lark Mail through third-party email clients.
